text_block_list.text:
In addition to early morning training, 
Kitasan Black was diligent in training even during her free time.

Haa, haa… Not yet! 
Trainer-san, please let me continue like this!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
choice_data_list: It's about time to take a break

text_block_list.text:
It's fine! I'm still full of energy. I don't want to waste 
Trainer-san's time, so let's keep going!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text: Ooooooooo…!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
With an amazing amount of spirit, Kitasan Black took off running. 
It was more than usual, and I could sense a hint of desperation.
[I don't want to waste Trainer-san's time]

…Perhaps, the training menu I put together for Kitasan Black 
made her feel a sense of impatience from me.
choice_data_list: (I can't let things continue like this…)

text_block_list.text:
I don't want her to feel rushed. I want Kitasan Black to run 
with peace of mind, in a way that she feels is her own-

Eh? Tomorrow, we're going to… look at the autumn leaves? I 
thought we were going to be training, but that seems so sudden…
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
choice_data_list: <size=42>I thought it'd be a good change of pace</size>

text_block_list.text: A change of pace…
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text: …Haa!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
I-I see! Trainer-san must be getting worn out…! 
That's right, it shouldn't be surprising.
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Aaah dang it. 
I'm such an insensitive lout…!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Understood! Let's have a 
change of pace, with all our might!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Like bam, easy-going!!! 
Leave everything to me!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Easy-going doesn't need so much spirit though, 
but well — for now, I made a promise to go view 
the autumn leaves with Kitasan Black.
Huh? That person…
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Excuse me, are you alright? 
Do you perhaps need directions…?
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text: Ah… Y-yeah, I do.
text_block_list.name: Lost Girl

text_block_list.text:
I had my friend draw me a map but, 
I'm not too familiar with this area…
text_block_list.name: Lost Girl

text_block_list.text:
Just a second. Since this is the station, um… 
ah, it's a little complicated. It's a little far so, I'll-
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text: Really? Thanks alot for your help!
text_block_list.name: Lost Girl

text_block_list.text:
Haa… upsy daisy… 
Oh, whoa…
text_block_list.name: Elder Man

text_block_list.text:
Wawaa, be careful…! 
You've got a lot of luggage there, old man.
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Oh, sorry for startling you. I wanted to get 
some souvenirs for my grandson, and ended up buying too much…
text_block_list.name: Elder Man

text_block_list.text:
You want to put that on the overhead storage, right? 
In that case, leave it to-
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text: Ah…
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
choice_data_list: Let me know when it's your stop

text_block_list.text: Yeah, that'd be helpful. Thank you kindly.
text_block_list.name: Elder Man

text_block_list.text: Waa, beautiful…! They're so vivid…!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
The sound of walking on the leaves is relaxing too! 
Look, let's go take a look over there too, Trainer-san.
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
The scenery from here is awesome…! 
Huh?! There's a dango shop over there!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, look at that! 
That mountain over there-
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Looks like the autumn leaves were a good choice. But, keeping up 
with the ever lively Kitasan Black's pace, was quite hard-

Aaaah, you're sweating alot… 
A-are you okay, Trainer-san?
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
choice_data_list: I'll be fine after a short rest

text_block_list.text:
… 
…I'm sorry!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Because I was pulling you around everywhere, 
you're that exhausted…!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
On top of that, on the way here… well, helping people… 
even Trainer-san ended up helping me out.
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Since she was helping people nearby, I was helping as 
much as possible without getting in the way. Besides-
choice_data_list: I was glad I could help you

text_block_list.text: ! Trainer-san…!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
…Wait, that's not it! No, well, 
on the other hand, that made me very happy too!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
But, it's just that I wanted Trainer-san to rest too, 
you're probably fatigued from our normal days too, so-
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
choice_data_list: <size=40>Guess I need to build up some stamina…</size>

text_block_list.text: Kuuuuuuu! You have plenty, you're fine…!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Everyday, you're helping out with my training, 
and when I go running off campus, you're there on a bike…!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
T-that may be true but, saying it like 
it's expected, is really… uuuuuu～…
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
…what should I do?… every single time, it's just me… 
I'm the only one being supported every time…
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text: (Haa… Dad… supporting someone, is really hard, isn't it?)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
